ygData.subject: RE: Vhalen Nostrolo
ygData.msgSnippet: He also tells the tale of Metala Highflit his lost love who turned to S&M and the ways of Mayong Mistmoore.  I remember long ago of some saying they had slain
ygData.messageBody:
He also tells the tale of Metala Highflit his lost love who turned to S&M
and the ways of Mayong Mistmoore. I remember long ago of some saying they
had slain her in Mistmoore, but that was so far back I can't recall the
details.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2000 12:06 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Vhalen Nostrolo


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

Uhm - doesn't he tell you about a hermit? And how the hermit stole his
song? Winds of Karana that he was composing - from here I can tell you more
if you want to know <spoilers> scroll to bottom of email.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sheldon, Colin [mailto:Colin.Sheldon@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2000 8:58 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Vhalen Nostrolo

From: "Sheldon, Colin" <Colin.Sheldon@...>


I was running through SK last night and paid a visit to our
old friend
Vhalen. He was actually pretty chatty, singing me a ballad
and then telling
me the story behind it. He spoke of an old flame of his
(her name was
Matala, I think -- notes are at home) and how she had dumped
him for someone
else and was now up to some nefarious purposes. I got
through the story and
tried to get him to say more, but some idiot and his pet
chose that moment
to whack the poor bard, so I can't be sure that I got
everything from him.

At the end of each section of text, Vhalen would ask if I
wanted him to go
on, but there were no brackets on anything. Typing in what
you would expect
to type in kept him going, however (e.g. "I would like to
hear more").
Unfortunately, he never indicates any sort of action you
should take, he
just says that Matala (if I remember her name correctly)
must be stopped.
Anyone else spoken to him lately? Is this an old quest that
I am just now
discovering? I'd appreciate any guidance.

Ranulf
Bard of 19 (almost 20) songs - Tunare

In the south east cornor of SK is a house surrounded by a stone wall.
Inside lives this hermit who is a ranger about level 20, skilled in the use
of magic. You can open the door to the wall but not to the house. But you
have bardic songs that when played will make him come out and fight you.
You will need a good group to help you kill him - especially at your age. I
don't think I ever solo'd him (but then I don't kite) - maybe after I was
25. He buffs himself with thorns and fights hard - with fine steel weapons
too. When you kill him, you will find a "broken lute" (that wieghs 10
pounds!) and a page to the song. Keep one only of each.

Now, how you are supposed to know this - I have no clue since I did it all
from spoilers but you take the flute to North Karana and give it to Cordelia
Minister - the bardette who loiters near the wizard spires and patrols to
the northwestern shops. She will give you the other page of the song and
you go back to Vahlen. Give him both pages and he will reward you with a
new song! Viola - Chant of battle! Just in case your spell book catches on
fire and you lose your existing song! Woo Hoo am I ever glad I did that
quest!

The good part is the xp for slaying the hermit - affectionately known as
Herman on our server and the FS weps he drops every 4 to 6 kills.


Sylly!
